modShortDescription: Lowers iron and steel tool stamina usage to a more friendly level. You will still need to perk into it and stay fed.
modDescription:
Lowers iron and steel tool stamina usage to a more friendly level. You will still need to perk into it and stay fed.

**[Download](https://github.com/wolfbain5/7dtd-a19/raw/master/tool%20stamina%20fix.rar)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/19825-wolfbain5s-a19-mods/).
